titlestmt.titleproper: National University Continuing Education Association (NUCEA) Records
titlestmt.subtitle: A description of its records at Syracuse University
titlestmt.author: MRC
titlestmt.sponsor:
The adult education holdings are collectively known as the
.

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: National University Continuing Education Association (NUCEA) Records
did.abstract: Records of the adult education organization. Unprocessed.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: The National University Continuing Education Association (NUCEA) was originally formed in 1915 as the National University Extension Association (NUEA). NUEA's focus was originally on establishing standards for correspondence schools and distance education, though its scope expanded considerably through the years and when it shifted to a division structure in the 1950s, correspondence study was only one of five charter units. In 1980 NUEA reorganized itself away from the division structure to a more national focus; to reflect this, the name was changed to the National University Continuing Education Association (NUCEA). In 1999 the word "National" was dropped as membership had expanded internationally, and the name became University Continuing Education Association (UCEA).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The National University Continuing Education Association (NUCEA) Records focus primarly on the years 1980-1999, but also contain substantial material from the organization under its previous name, the National University Extension Association (NUEA), and some material dating from after its 1999 name change to University Continuing Education Association (UCEA).

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and remains in original order.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: &scrc_name; has more than 60 collections relating to adult and continuing education; please refer to &subjindex; for a complete listing. See in particular the National University Extension Association (NUEA) Records and the Commission of Professors of Adult Education (CPAE) Records.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is currently unprocessed and not available for research. Please contact &scrc_name; for more information.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

National University Continuing Education Association (NUCEA) Records,
&su_name;

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of the National University Continuing Education Association (U.S.), 1969-2000.

note.p: An inventory has not yet been created for this collection. Please contact the Repository listed above for more information.
